title: Bug 103963: No friendly error message displayed when there is no data for a series
OB: When there is no data for a series, the application does not display a friendly error message.
EB: The application should display a friendly error message when there is no data for a series.
SR:
To reproduce: 
1. Navigate to the series section of the application.
2. Remove all data for a series.
3. Observe that no friendly error message is displayed.
